name: pretty fast red sport car (bitsy)
description:
What is the game about: 

it is about a car that always wanted to be a plane and fly in the endless sky

what to expect:

in the game you will experience a story about what is lying under blue sky

game as a guide:

Those who wonder what they will encounter when they reach the sky will find useful information

How to play:

push key down to experience the story. When the level of “cups of tea” came just try to find warmer cup of tea to find the exit that will pass you the next level.

last words:

let’s play and let’s getting know more about pretty fast red sport car and its destiny
